author: Home Repair Tutor
description: DITRA- HEAT cable tips…the cold splice is important. It has to be 3 inches from the wall. I remove the mat and the plywood. This allows the top of the cold splice to be below my tile floor. Many thanks to @schlutersystemsna for providing supplies for my client’s custom bathroom remodel 👍🏽🔥#ditraheat #heatedfloors #bathroomremodel #getitdone #schlutersystems #brandpartner
title: DITRA-HEAT Cable Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor
